            <ol class="A-TYPS6R-RW-DEV footnotes-list without-bottom-padding"><li><div id="fn-cards-welcomeoffer" tabindex="-1">迎新推广优惠须受相关<a rel="noopener noreferrer" href="/content/dam/hsbc/hk/sc/docs/credit-cards/offers/welcome-online-terms-and-conditions.pdf">条款及细则</a>约束。 </div></li><li><div id="fn-cards-milescalculation" tabindex="-1">首港币8,000元消费尊享低至港币0.4元=1里优惠兑换率，计算方式如下：                <br>
